choose.when: insert into tbl_product(productname, description, brand, category, subcategory, pictureurl, mainpictureurl) values(#{productname}, #{description}, #{brand}, #{category}, #{subcategory}, #{pictureurl}, #{mainpictureurl} )
choose.otherwise: insert into tbl_product(productname, description, brand, category, subcategory) values(#{productname}, #{description}, #{brand}, #{category}, #{subcategory})

mapper.select: select pictureurl from tbl_product where productid=#{productid}
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'ustyle' AND TABLE_NAME = 'tbl_product'

select count(*) from tbl_product
where ${searchOption} like '%${searchKeyword}%'
SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_product WHERE subcategory = #{subcategory}

SELECT productid, productname, description, brand, category, subcategory, pictureurl, mainpictureurl FROM (SELECT (@row_number:=@row_number+1) as row_number, productid, productname, description, brand, category, subcategory, pictureurl, mainpictureurl FROM tbl_product, (SELECT @row_number:=0) as t WHERE subcategory = #{subcategory} ORDER BY productid DESC ) X WHERE X.row_number BETWEEN #{first} and #{last}

choose.otherwise: update tbl_product set productname = #{productname}, description = #{description}, brand = #{brand}, category = #{category}, subcategory = #{subcategory}, pictureurl = '[/ustylenone.jpg]', mainpictureurl = '/ustylenone.jpg' where productid = #{productid}
